page.title: 01 A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NADINE
page.content: I GET UP ABOUT QUARTER TO EIGHT AND MOSTLY GET MY BREAKFAST MYSELF.I HAVE FROSTIES,TOAST AND TEA.I GET MY SCHOOLBAG AND CATCH THE BUS WHICH USUALLY COMES AT NINE O'CLOCK.I TAKE A BUS BECAUSE I STAY AT BRIDGE END AND OUR SCHOOL IS AT HAMNAVOE WHICH IS TWO MILES AWAY. ON MONDAYS I GET GYM, ON TUESDAYS ART AND I GET PIANO LESSONS. OTHER THINGS AT SCHOOL ARE KNITTING AND MUSIC. WE GO HOME FROM SCHOOL AT 3.30 P.M. THEN I CHANGE MY CLOTHES AND GO OUT TO PLAY ON MY BIKE OR SIT IN AND WATCH T.V. MY HOBBIES ARE PONIES, READING AND GOING TO THE BROWNIES. AT NIGHT I SOMETIMES FEED THE HENS AND HELP DAD ROUND THE CROFT. AT TEN O'CLOCK I GO TO BED AND SOMETIMES READ A BOOK.
